15.title: Halloween

episode of.title: IMDb on the Scene - Interviews (TV Series 2018– )

15.plot: IMDb cuts to the chase with 'Halloween' director David Gordon Green about his sequel to John Carpenter's 1978 cult classic. Plus, star Jamie Lee Curtis, producer Jason Blum, and the legend himself, John Carpenter, who also composed the film, give perspective on working with Green and the 40-year legacy of the original.

episode of.title: IMDb on the Scene - Interviews (TV Series 2018– )

47.title: The Umbrella Academy

48.title: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World

episode of.title: IMDb on the Scene - Interviews (TV Series 2018– )

48.plot: Instead of saying farewell to their characters, we asked stars of 'How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World' to cast them in a current movie or TV show. Also we were curious how many times they cried while watching the movie as their trilogy wrapped up.

imdb.title: IMDb on the Scene - Interviews
plot: IMDb takes you on the scene with interviews featuring the cast and filmmakers of up-and-coming films.
